description: Bag of crisp, sweet red apples.
Hot, roasted whole chicken with herb seasoning.
Malted puffs covered in milk chocolate.
Fresh full-cream milk in a plastic jug.
White cotton crew-neck shirt.
Ready-made pasta meal with mince and white sauce.
Lemon-flavoured fizzy water, sugar-free.
Net bag of four ripe avocados.
Triangular bread wedges with chicken filling.
Chewy fruit-flavoured gum sweets.
Black fabric bag made from recycled plastic.
Thick plain yoghurt in a tub.
Soft loaf of white bread, pre-sliced.
Large box of mixed-size free-range eggs.
Crinkle-cut potato chips with black pepper seasoning.
Pulp-free fruit juice in a plastic bottle.
Bowl of lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta.
Two thick cuts of matured beef steak.
Pack of five black cotton socks.
Liquid soap with a lavender scent.
